mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C. Only authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of George Washington's tomb. View is a close-up of the tomb fa√ßade with a gentleman standing in profile to the right of the iron gate entrance. Label on the reverse reads: Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon, The ante room to the Vault is about 12 feet square, and here are seen the Sarcophagi

the one on the right containing the remains of General Washington, and that on the left, those of Martha his wife. It was built in accordance with the directions contained in Washington's will, to which his remains were removed in 1831.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
New tomb
